name: Shadow Chill
effect:
Inflicts Wounds. 
 At Silver Rank, increase this move's power to 4.
 At Gold Rank, this move inflicts frostbite.
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's power to 6.
 At Diamond Rank, this move's effectivity is always at least Super Effective.
description: A shadowy ice attack that may freeze.
